{"name": "Life Learning Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Hours of Operation
Weekly:
Tuesday - be registered by 11:00am
Friday - be registered by 1:30pm
*Giveaway  2 - 4 pm
Monthly:
1st Wednesday
3rd Saturday
Registration begins at 7am and ends at 10am
Giveaway begins at 9amand ends at 10:30am", "email": "", "url": "https://mygracelife.net/joseph-s-storehouse", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1083 Allgood Road Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Marietta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30062", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.9782687, "longitude": -84.5226285}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 971-4232", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "02:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}]}
